subject: Sales
title: Open vs. Closed Questions
description: A quick win: understand Open vs. Closed Questions.

hook.text: 'Like your provider?' gets yes or no. 'What frustrates you most about them?' opens a floodgate.

buildup.text: Closed questions confirm facts. Open questions reveal feelings, stories, and hidden motivations.

discovery.text: Research shows top performers ask three times more open-ended questions than average sellers do.

twist.text: Open questions backfire when overdone. If every answer demands an essay, buyers feel interrogated.

climax.text: Blend both: closed questions to confirm, open ones to explore. That rhythm keeps conversations natural.

punchline.text: Open questions explore. Closed questions confirm.

quiz.question: When should you use closed questions in sales?
options: To confirm specific facts after exploration
